LanguageData.Apparello_Standissue.label: 标准工作服
LanguageData.Apparello_Standissue.description: Standard military issue air force overalls. Very common amongst orbital drop squads。
LanguageData.Apparello_MedicalApron.label: 外科医生围裙
LanguageData.Apparello_MedicalApron.description: Lovely plastic apron for all your bloodspilling needs。
LanguageData.Apparello_Syndicatellorare.label: 流浪者护胸
LanguageData.Apparello_Syndicatellorare.description: Lone wanderers would wear something like this while on their noble crusade or vendetta。
LanguageData.Apparello_Ammobelt.label: 弹药袋
LanguageData.Apparello_Smithaprontosaurus.label: 围裙
LanguageData.Apparello_Smithaprontosaurus.description: These kind of hardened leather aprons are used by professionals of many trades。
LanguageData.Apparello_Cookaprontosaurus.label: 厨师围裙
LanguageData.Apparello_Cookaprontosaurus.description: Pocketed cloth apron intended for enhancing your housekeeping experience. It's a hygiene thing, you wouldn't understand。
LanguageData.Apparello_Trypophobia.label: 商人外套
LanguageData.Apparello_Trypophobia.description: What is a trader? A miserable little pile of bags -Count Dravania, moments before being lynched by an angry mob。
LanguageData.Apparello_Tribalpad.label: 部落垫肩
LanguageData.Apparello_Meffectwo.label: 魅力头饰
LanguageData.Apparello_Meffectwo.description: Mostly airtight headgear designed for deep-space explorers to combat the hostile bacteria on uninhabitable planets。
LanguageData.Apparello_MojoFeather.label: 部落头饰
LanguageData.Apparello_MojoFeather.description: Tribal headdress or a foot bottom torturing device. It's very feathery。
LanguageData.Apparello_Lecap.label: 平顶帽
LanguageData.Apparello_Lecap.description: The most important piece of many a rebel army uniform。
LanguageData.Apparello_Sandtrader.label: 游商帽
LanguageData.Apparello_Sandtrader.description: Roaming merchants use these to protect their face from dust storms and the like。
